Malta-flagged container ship reported seeing 3 explosions towards its port quarter off Yemen -AmbreyBritish maritime security firm Ambrey said on Tuesday that a Malta-flagged container ship reported seeing three explosions towards its port quarter, 15 miles (24 km) southwest of Yemen's Mocha. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 21:04:28 GMT 6DYFWRVQBBKCRCYPG25KGCUTT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/malta-flaged-container-ship-reported-seeing-3-explosions-towards-its-port-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
UN Security Council likely to meet Wednesday on Red Sea, says French UN envoyThe U.N. Security Council may meet as early as Wednesday on the situation in the Red Sea, the French ambassador to the United Nations, whose country assumed the council presidency, said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 20:53:43 GMT TFXZ7FOKURNRTOFZH3LCP7C7PQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-security-council-likely-meet-wednesday-red-sea-says-french-un-envoy-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
US slams Israeli ministers' statements on resettlement of Palestinians outside GazaThe U.S. State Department on Tuesday slammed recent statements from Israeli ministers Bezalel Smotrich and Itamar Ben Gvir that advocated for the resettlement of Palestinians outside of Gaza, calling the rhetoric "inflammatory and irresponsible." Tue, 02 Jan 2024 20:48:03 GMT SFOSWJP62NJFJFWSQBVODVEM2I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-slams-israeli-ministers-statements-resettlement-palestinians-outside-gaza-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
White House turns to US Supreme Court in Texas razor-wire border disputePresident Joe Biden's administration on Tuesday asked the U.S. Supreme Court to intervene after a federal appeals court temporarily blocked it from destroying razor wire fencing Texas placed along its border with Mexico to deter illegal border crossings. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 20:19:08 GMT 4ZLJSJVBERP7TBYSLMLML77OLE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-administration-asks-us-supreme-court-intervene-texas-border-row-2024-01-02/John Kruzel, Andrew Chung世界美国
Hamas' Arouri was a key player until death in sudden Beirut strikeDeputy Hamas leader Saleh al-Arouri had long expected the Israeli drone strike that security sources said killed him in Beirut on Tuesday, three months after his group's surprise cross-border assault that triggered a devastating war in Gaza. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 19:21:13 GMT云恩5UI73NL67AX5SVCZSHZGE4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-arouri-was-key-player-until-death-sudden-beirut-strike-2024-01-02/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Ukrainian apartment dweller works hard to cope after Russian bombingInured by nearly two years of war, Olena Ohiievych wasted no time getting to work on Tuesday as she confronted the shambles left in her apartment by the latest Russian air attacks on Kyiv and its suburbs. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 18:29:38 GMT 2KT2RGL6YVIYFJCSWWX5JC76QM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-apartment-dweller-works-hard-cope-after-Russian-bombing-2024-01-02/Yuri Kovalenko世界欧洲
Five Venezuelans freed out of 31 migrants kidnapped in MexicoMexican security services have freed five Venezuelans kidnapped over the weekend by gunmen, local authorities said on Tuesday, as they searched for another 26 people snatched from a bus traveling to the border city of Matamoros. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 18:25:26 GMT OSSGM42L65NDDGDYICEZOUKJEI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ Five-venezuelans-freed-out-31-migrants-kidnapped-mexico-2024-01-02/Reuters世界美洲
'It was a miracle': How passengers escaped a JAL fireball in TokyoThe flight between the northern city of Sapporo and Tokyo's Haneda airport is Japan's busiest air route, and one of the most frequent services anywhere in the world. Japan Airlines (JAL) operates 16 round-trip flights a day. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 17:50:36 GMT AIRQT6FAFVJGHJGICJFNZ2ZJEA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/it-was-miracle-how-passengers-escaped-jal-fireball-tokyo-2024-01-02/Daniel Leussink, Yoshifumi Takemoto世界亚太地区
France to send forensic experts to Tokyo after airport collisionA team of forensic experts from planemaker Airbus and French state agency BAE will arrive in Japan on Wednesday to help authorities investigate the deadly accident involving a A350 plane at Tokyo's Haneda airport, they said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 17:39:37 GMT 6EPFCVIKBBK7XP55GTEAREQGUE https://www.reuters.com/world/japan/france-send-forensic-experts-tokyo-after-airport-collision-2024-01-02/Reuters世界日本
Evacuation from burning JAL jet helped by passengers leaving bagsAll 379 people aboard a Japan Airlines airliner escaped after a collision with a Coast Guard aircraft at Tokyo's Haneda airport that killed five of six crew on the smaller aircraft on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 17:32:37 GMT JAUQY7ZVRVMRHODB2SBT2UZWVY https://www.reuters.com/world/japan/evacuation-burning-jal-jet-helped-by-passengers-leaving-bags-2024-01-02/Tim Hepher, Allison Lampert世界日本
Israeli drone kills deputy Hamas chief in BeirutDeputy Hamas chief Saleh al-Arouri was killed on Tuesday night in an Israeli drone strike on Beirut's southern suburbs of Dahiyeh, a stronghold of the allied Lebanese militant group Hezbollah, signalling the conflict between Hamas and Israel could be expanding to engulf more of the region. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 16:04:53 GMT DP3F36XKUFJVVALC7UBDWEGXCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/explosion-southern-beirut-suburb-dahiyeh-two-security-sources-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
